module.name: qlopaypalcommerce
module.description: <b>An instant global business.</b><br>One integration for all your online payment needs.<br><b>Benefits</b><ul><li>Enable a seamless buying experience for your customers that drives conversion and loyalty.</li><li>Accept PayPal payments with simplified onboarding, adaptable integration and easy account setup.</li><li>Access to 377M+ PayPal customers around the globe*, with local currency support for better money management.</li><li>Peace of mind for you and your customers with buyer and seller protection on eligible sales.</li></ul>*PayPal Fourth Quarters 2020 Result
module.author: Webkul
